PageInfo.Message:
Traveling is always dangerous, with enemy
attacks, falling from heights, etc.
Always have a way to recover your health.
Priests and other recovery magic is the main
means of recovery, but<COL ffdc78>recovery magic
can only recover up to "Healable Limit" (white
gauge) of the reduced health.</COL>
Please make sure you are in good shape!

Additionally, there may be instances where you
receive penalties, known as <COL
ffdc78>"debilitations"</COL>, due to special
attacks from enemies or the effects of the
terrain.
In such cases, please use healing magic, items
with debilitation treatment effects, or stay at an
inn to resolve the debilitation.
